text: All Souls, St Margarets is a Church of England church on Northcote Road in St Margarets in the London Borough of Richmond upon Thames. Its vicar is Richard Frank. Services are held on Sundays at 10am and 4:30pm. Communion followed by lunch is held on the first Monday of the month at 12 noon. The style of worship is Open Evangelical. ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Church of England church buildings in the London Borough of Richmond upon Thames Category:Diocese of London
title: All Souls, St Margarets
